title: Love the new April Fools skins, but...

replies.body: I half expected to see someone complaining that the board's thumbnail preview cropped itself to only show boobs.

Not all of her skins have horns, as someone has mentioned, Divine Soraka. 

We felt that that the skin would become a bit too busy with the large sunhat with fruit, and a horn.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=bTAwe5zT,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-20T17:16:26.803+0000)
>
> Not all of her skins have horns, as someone has mentioned, Divine Soraka. 
> 
> We felt that that the skin would become a bit too busy with the large sunhat with fruit, and a horn.

My only peeve with the splash is how unusually and insanely long her neck is, and that it looks nothing like Soraka. It looks like a washed up barbie doll that just posesses Soraka's kit. Those lips are disturbing too lol. x_x
this skin is based on divine soraka (human soraka) which doesn't have the horn too
But she's still purpleish with wierd ears.
I can't tell if she is actually purple there or if it is lighting.

> [{quoted}](name=RavenKouhai,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=bTAwe5zT,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-20T06:12:41.526+0000)
>
> But she's still purpleish with wierd ears.

yeah
a middle stage :3

anyway the model is clearly based on divine soraka, check the skirt
